title: Ep. 224: How Makeup Can Improve Self-Esteem & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 224: How Makeup Can Improve Self-Esteem & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: We’re talking about Alicia Keys’s new (vegan!) line with e.l.f. Cosmetics, the Park Avenue plastic surgeon who’s getting catfished, problems with the “fox eye” trend, the Fenty Skin re-sell market, Glossier closing retail locations, and more. Plus, we ...
description:
We’re talking about Alicia Keys’s new (vegan!) line with e.l.f. Cosmetics, the Park Avenue plastic surgeon who’s getting catfished, problems with the “fox eye” trend, the Fenty Skin re-sell market, Glossier closing retail locations, and more. Plus, we dig into a new research study that shows how applying makeup may actually improve your self-esteem—and how it could be used as a form of art therapy in the future. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
